Emma Frances Bear

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Mathews
  3. Location of Family: Unknown
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Minden, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 7
  7. Date of Birth: 1901-09-29, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1987-04-28, Bassett, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Emma Greenfield
  11. Spouse Name: Floyd Greenfield
  12. Source: Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf. Plains Bound: Fragile Cargo: Revealing Orphan Train Reality (Outskirts Press, 2006), n.p.; Find-A-Grave.
